channel.title: Projects on Akhil Simha

item.title: I2C Learning Board
item.description: I wanted to get started with PCB designing. After a lot of beating around the bush, I finally decided to work with some ICs instead of just designing a PCB that only blinks.

item.title: TogglDisplay
item.description: My office uses Toggl(https://toggl.com/) a time tracking tool, to track the working hours.
